summary: Updated 20+ files in .claude/context/, docs/, and skills/ directories to replace Lean/ProofChecker references with Neovim-appropriate patterns. Removed Lean Intent field from plan format, generalized report format, replaced domain patterns, and updated routing examples across core orchestration and documentation files.
